mapper.select: select * from member_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_delete = 0
select * from member_user where username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_delete = 0
select * from member_user where phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_delete = 0
mapper.update:
update member_user set member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_password = #{memberPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_card_number = #{memberCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
